name: mainapp
description: Demo that serve a Single Page Application that load micro frontends based on browser routes

scripts.install:app: npm run install:react && npm run install:vue && npm run install:angular && npm run install:orchestrator && npm install
scripts.build:react: cd ./react-app && REACT_APP_MICRO_FRONTEND=true PUBLIC_URL=/public/react/ npm run-script build
scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:angular && npm run build:orchestrator

author: Yahima Duarte
